Prev: Cal Poly Phase Change Window Up: Solar Decathlon Houses Next: Crowder Drury, I

Cal Poly Popup Polyhedron



One part of the decathlon involved communicating your design to the public. This team's handout could be folded into a model of the house, much like a pop-up orthogonal polyhedron I posted on my blog a few years back.
Taken Saturday, October 17, 2015, 04:43:19PM. Original image size: 3083x2466, 1.3Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS 40D, 1/1600s@ F4, ISO 200, 17-40mm f/4L, 40mm (64mm equiv)
PS CS5 Exp0.5 B10, Profile, Crop, USM 30:5
